NOT YET?
What's the hold up! You still have 5 WEEKS to get started and do 16hrs to qualify for a job interview. Loads of time!
If you need a help finding a placement let us know we have great guidance and advice for how to get you started:
headstart@the-challenge.org
Welcome to the start of your New Look journey! Now for the exciting part - your first steps as a New Look Sales Advisor! We have three exciting workshops for you to attend that will provide you with all the information you need to know about New Look, your upcoming interview and provide some great communication coaching that will be invaluable for any future interview you may attend. Next steps to become a New Look Sales Advisor We have combined the workshops into two sessions:
Combined New Look Customer Service and Compulsory Workshop AGL Communications Coaching
You need to book yourself onto both of these workshops. Due to the level of demand we have two options available for you, either a combined New Look and AGL Workshop on the same date, or two individual sessions across next week. You can find full details on the various workshops below. Option 1: Combined New Look and AGL Workshop (Book ONE only) 24th: 0900-1330 24th: 1100-1545 28th: 0900-1330 28th: 1200-1630 Option 2: Individual New Look and AGL Workshops (Book ONE New Look AND ONE AGL session) New Look: 24th: 1130-1315 New Look: 27th: 0930-1115 New Look: 27th: 1230-1415 AGL: 28th: 1100-1330 AGL: 28th: 1400-1630 Thank you for choosing New Look as your prefered job choice. The chance to change preferance has now passed. If you have changed your job preference before 19/8/15 to something else please ignore this email. Good Luck on your journey to become a New Look Sales Advisor.
If you have any further questions please go get in contact with us. Otherwise, keep clocking up those volunteering hours and get yourself booked on your workshops as soon as possible! We look forward to seeing you all next week!
Any questions? Email the HeadStart team, check out our website or get in touch on facebook.
